ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: I didn t get the chance to say hello Lunarpine said to Shadow Wing as they moved away, Now I m already saying goodbye. She was a good ship, I can tell.

"I didn't get the chance to say hello" Lunarpine said to Shadow Wing 
as they moved away,"Now I'm already saying goodbye. She was a good 
ship, I can tell."
Lunarpine glanced back at the Ark."he Ark had a potential for 
greatness, I hope that one day she'll live up to it." 
"I just left one home for this one, Now I'm leaving this one for 
another one. Is this how you always live?" He gives Shadow Wing 
another look,"Do you ever have time to settle down?"-

-- In 
nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing/KitKat::
> 
> Shadow Wing:: She transformed into beast mode and flew next to 
> Lunarpine."Well, shall we off then?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> 
> KitKat:: She watched the wolf and owl through the trees. She drew 
closer to 
> the ground and hid under the brush.  She could her the owl talking 
to the 
> wolf.  She heard the other one tell the others to meet up with him 
and 
> watched as he took to the sky.  Now the owl and wolf remain. She 
watched and 
> listened from the shadows.
> 
> ----Original Message----
> >From: Yanshosh@a...
> >Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> >To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> >Subject: Neo Beast Wars
> 
> >::Prowl/Ramulus::
> >
> >Prowl shakes his head. "Icedemon betrayed the Alliance before. I 
don't know
> >if he'll stay loyal."
> >
> >He looks down at his scanner, then puts it away. "Whatever you 
smelled, it
> >must be gone."
> >
> >Prowl activates his comm-link. "Ramulus, could you patrol the Ark 
untill we
> >get back?"
> >
> >He turns to the others. "Let's go."
> >
> >With that he exits the Ark, transforms into beast mode, and flies 
off 
> >towards
> >the Cybertronian Fire.
> >~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> >Ramulus nods, recieving Prowl's transmission.
> >
> >"We're needed back at the Ark," he says to Primal Prime, turning 
around to
> >get back to the Ark.
> 
>
